price: 27. Alle Wuxuu rabaa inuu idinka toobad aqbalo, kuwase raaca shahwadooda, waxay rabaan inaad weecataan weecasho weyn.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُواْ مَيۡلًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yurīdu an yatūba ʿalaykum wayurīdu alladhīna yattabiʿūna al-shahawāti an tamīlū maylan ʿaẓīman
